entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -34.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard developing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the afternoon then mainly sunny. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
